name: Ace of Spades
summary:
《Ace of Spades》（缩写：AOS；翻译名称：黑桃A、黑桃As），是一款沙盒建造射击游戏，玩家可以在一个三维世界里用各种方块建造建筑物抵御敌方攻击，也可以攻击对方。此游戏由Ben Aksoy独立开发。《Ace of Spades》基于网上服务器平台。游戏队伍分为两队，蓝队和绿队，玩家可以选择加入蓝队和绿队，再选择步枪、冲锋枪、散弹枪。每名玩家有100生命值，生命值少于100时，可以到补给站补生命值。当玩家死亡时，需要等候时间重新游戏。最近Steam被买下，推出全新版本AOS。由于游戏地图与《Minecraft》相似，所以又被称为“枪战版Minecraft”。

it’s awesome, free and runs on any PC. It’s the best bits of Minecraft crossed with the fast-paced shooter gameplay of Team Fortress.

Build anything – defensive positions to fortresses
Destroy enemy structures, dropping opponents to their death
Use your spade to dig through terrain – make trenches or tunnels
Massive maps with lakes, rivers and tunnels
Realistic rifle, shotgun and SMG including ironsights and recoil
Dynamic lighting system based on ambient occlusion
Up to 32 players battling simultaneously
CTF or Territory Control game modes
